items.title: Mourinho verliest ondanks prachtgoal Aursnes zicht op koploper Porto
items.summary: Benfica is zondagavond verder achterop geraakt in de Portugese titelstrijd. Een fraaie treffer van voormalig Feyenoord-middenvelder Fredrik Aursnes was niet genoeg voor de overwinning op bezoek bij Sporting Braga.

items.title: Van Dijk: More to come from Wirtz for Liverpool
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk has heaped praise on teammate Florian Wirtz and backed him to continue delivering for Liverpool after he scored his first goal for the club in Saturday's 2-1 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers.

items.title: Gray heads Spurs to victory at Crystal Palace
items.summary: Nineteen-year-old Archie Gray scores his first senior goal for Tottenham Hotspur to beat Crystal Palace 1-0.

items.title: Van landmacht naar De Graafschap: 'Stick to your plan'
items.summary: De Graafschap stelde dit jaar een landelijke bekendheid aan als nieuwe voorzitter van de raad van commissarissen: Mart de Kruif, generaal buiten dienst, rijkelijk gedecoreerd in zijn veertigjarige loopbaan bij de landmacht.

items.title: 'Watkins has the edge - but Calvert-Lewin could yet make World Cup'
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin is the top English scorer in the Premier League this season - can he force his way back into the national squad five years after his last cap?

items.title: Algerije heeft aan nipte zege genoeg voor plek bij laatste zestien Afrika Cup
items.summary: Na Egypte en Nigeria is ook Algerije verzekerd van een plek in de achtste finales van de Afrika Cup. Sterspeler Riyad Mahrez tekende vanaf de penaltystip voor het enige en dus beslissende doelpunt tegen Burkina Faso.

items.title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
items.summary: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup played in the United States.

items.title: Spurs ease pressure on Frank with win at Palace
items.summary: Archie Gray's first goal for Tottenham ensured they ended a rollercoaster 2025 with a 1-0 win at Crystal Palace to ease the pressure on Thomas Frank.

items.title: South Africa coach slams lack of 'vibe' at AFCON
items.summary: South Africa coach Hugo Broos isn't getting that usual Africa Cup of Nations feeling in Morocco.

items.title: Lang de dupe van 'paradoxaal transferverbod' voor Napoli? 'We sluiten niets uit'
items.summary: Napoli-directeur Giovanni Manna is niet te spreken over het transferverbod dat Napoli is opgelegd voor de komende winterwindow. De Serie A-kampioen heeft niet voldaan aan de criteria die verbonden zijn aan de uitgebreide verhouding tussen arbeidskosten en inkomsten. Dit betekent dat Napoli eerst moet verkopen, voordat er nieuwe spelers mogen worden aangetrokken.

items.title: VI Live: aanvoerder De Roon ontvangt Internazionale
items.summary: Goedendag en welkom in de VI Live van zondag 28 december! De laatste zondag van 2025 zit vol met leuke wedstrijden, en in dit liveblog hoeft u niks te missen.

Sch√ºller, who has six months left on her contract, has been a prolific goalscorer for club and country, scoring more than 100 goals for Bayern and 54 times in 82 games for her country, and she will be seen as a marquee signing for the Women‚Äôs Super League side. items.title: Archie Gray heads Spurs to victory at Crystal Palace to ease pressure on Frank
items.summary: Eighteen months can be a very long time in football ‚Äì especially if you are still a teenager. After a mixed start to life in north London, Archie Gray could not have picked a better occasion to score his first Tottenham goal since joining from Leeds in the summer of 2024 than his 60th appearance. With Thomas Frank already showing signs of not being the first Spurs manager to have been overwhelmed by expectations, after a run of just one win in their previous eight Premier League matches, Gray‚Äôs scrappy header in the first half ensured a topsy-turvy year ended with a victory that lifts his side to within one point of Crystal Palace in the table. Continue reading...

items.title: Semenyo wants future resolved by 1 January

Gray's first senior goal clinches win for Spurs at Crystal Palace
items.summary: Archie Gray's first senior goal secured a battling 1-0 win for Tottenham against Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.

items.title: Kyrgios beats Sabalenka in 'Battle of the Sexes' showdown
items.summary: Nick Kyrgios came out on top in the latest 'Battle of the Sexes' exhibition match with a straight-sets victory over women's world No 1 Aryna Sabalenka in Dubai.

items.title: Anderson wins Ally Pally classic as Cross sets up Littler clash
items.summary: Gary Anderson edged out Jermaine Wattimena in a seven-set thriller at Alexandra Palace to reach the last 16 of the World Darts Championship.
